metadata.title: CVE-2017-9218 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
The mp4ff_read_stsd function in common/mp4ff/mp4atom.c in Freeware AdvancedAudio Decoder 2 (FAAD2) 2.7 allows remote attackers to cause a denial ofservice (invalid memory read and application crash) via a crafted mp4 file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-9218` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

faad - 2.8.0~cvs20150510-1ubuntu0.1
libfaad2 - 2.8.0~cvs20150510-1ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: faad2 package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.8.0~cvs20150510-1ubuntu0.1').
